column3: Adventurer! <If(PlayerParameter(4))>Ma'am<Else/>Sir</If>! How might I be of service?
Me, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>ma'am<Else/>sir</If>? I am charged with security of this base, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>ma'am<Else/>sir</If>!
It has been but a year since I took up this post, but I mean to defend Skull Valley with my life, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>ma'am<Else/>sir</If>!

Allow me to explain, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>ma'am<Else/>sir</If>! Skull Valley is an encampment established for the purpose of protecting against Sahagin incursions. Though early contact with the fishbacks resulted in only small-scale skirmishes, they have begun moving against us in greater numbers.
Thus, the facilities here were expanded and reinforced to accommodate a larger Maelstrom presence.

It would be an honor to have you assist in the many duties that must be performed in order to keep Skull Valley─and perforce, Limsa Lominsa─safe from the Sahagin threat, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>ma'am<Else/>sir</If>!
What kind of place is this?
